snippet.title: Hit the trail: 7 gorgeous fall hikes
snippet.description:
* The air is crisp, the leaves are falling and animals are starting to prepare for the winter ahead.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/16/travel/seven-spectacular-fall-hikes/index.html

snippet.title: When autumn leaves fall
snippet.description:
* A new crispness in the air. The red, orange and yellow of the leaves changing colors. The crunch of the first few leaves on the ground.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/09/21/travel/fall-leaf-peeping-autumn/index.html

snippet.title: Autumn on the coast: Go now for less
snippet.description:
* Curl up for a siesta on a sultry strand in Mexico or the Caribbean. Take a fall trip to Florida's sun-kissed beaches. Kick back in a cottage on the stunning Outer Banks in North Carolina. Or, go for lobster and an autumn bike ride in Cape Cod.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/10/04/travel/autumn-beach-trips/index.html

snippet.description:
* Washington (CNN) â€“ In the "will he stay or will he go?" saga, a Senior Obama Administration official confirms to CNN that, this time it seems, Pete Rouse really is leaving the administration. When asked if this time Rouse was really leaving, a Senior...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2013/12/12/senior-obama-aide-pete-rouse-leaving-administration/

* Transcripts | Overview | The Players |The Bombing | CNN Stories

snippet.title: Drought of 2012 conjures up Dust Bowl memories, raises questions for tomorrow
snippet.description:
* Some 3.5 million people fled their homes in Oklahoma, Texas, and elsewhere, the bone-dry landscape, blistering heat and choking dust storms unfit for growing and raising the crops and cattle they relied on to survive.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/09/15/us/drought-perspective/index.html

snippet.title: University officials to face trial in Penn State sex scandal
snippet.description:
* A Pennsylvania judge ruled Friday that the perjury case against two former Penn State university officials will go to trial over their roles in a child sex abuse scandal involving former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/12/16/justice/pennsylvania-sex-scandal/index.html

snippet.title: Whither to flee this winter? Go West, snowbirds, go West
snippet.description:
* Attention all snowbirds: If you're looking for the best retreat this season, go West, you travelers, go West. The western half of the Lower 48 is forecast to have a warmer-than-average winter.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/18/us/winter-outlook/index.html
